ygData.subject: Re: Correction....
ygData.msgSnippet: Fenidune, if you take the boat to Butcherblock, look for Paralto...I will be glad to guide you to Kelethin where you can buy both the level 8 and 9 songs.  Be
ygData.messageBody:
Fenidune, if you take the boat to Butcherblock, look for Paralto...I will be
glad to guide you to Kelethin where you can buy both the level 8 and 9
songs. Be sure to bring plenty of money though! I just bought my level 9
song for 4 plat, 6 gold, if I remember correctly.

Paralto

> -----Original Message-----
> From: A.Rubman [mailto:Naturdoc@...]
> Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 2:32 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Correction....
>
>
> From: "A.Rubman" <Naturdoc@...>
>
> Ah ya must be a Freeport Lad eh? *grins* No need to get excited my
> friend, the Bardic guild of freeport wants you to travel and visit our
> compatriots in other lands. For level 8 I'd suggest taking the boat ride
> to Kelethin and visiting our wood-elf songweavers. For level 9 either
> the grand port town of Qeynos or Kelthin as well will have the tunes you
> are seeking. Enjoy the music my brother, and remember a song is but a
> way to change people's minds.
>
>
> ((There is a great bards guide, not to saye Jythri's page is not good,
> but for cold hard facts and hints "http://bardsguide.dhs.org/" is the
> all around best for Bardic info))
>
> -Luini-
> Half-Elf serving Marr on Innoruk
>
> -----Original Message-----
